column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers

column.name: FEATURE_CODE
column.comment: This field contains the feature code

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: FEATURE_GROUP
column.comment: This attribute groups all the different features according to the requirements of the processes. By using this grouping, it is possible to view the features in the context of the process. SF Service feature OC One-time charge PF Penalty MS Miscellaneous P

column.name: SWITCH_ACT_NEEDED
column.comment: This attribute defines whether switch activation is needed for this feature.

column.name: SWITCH_CODE
column.comment: This attribute defines the code sent to the switch to activate the feature (if activation is required).

column.name: USAGE_SCHEME_POSS
column.comment: This attribute defines whether the usage scheme can be defined for this feature.

column.name: MPS_FEATURE_CODE
column.comment: inner feature code

column.name: MPS_RATING_PRIORITY
column.comment: This attribute defines the rating priority of a switch or scoped feature, i.e., a feature with priority value of 1 is selected for rating before a feature with priority value of 2. Some of the features can have the priority value Null, because they are no

column.name: SERVICE_LEVEL
column.comment: This attribute defines the level of service provided by this feature respective tariff option · B - Ban · C - Subscriber

column.name: PRORATION_IND
column.comment: This attribute defines whether the feature's recurring charge (RC) will be prorated. It is possible to define that the charge is either always prorated, never prorated, or a charge with no proration, if the service is active for a customer on a bill day.

column.name: PRODUCT_TYPE
column.comment: Identifies the participant's product type (e.g. GSM).

column.name: FTR_DESC_SEQ
column.comment: This field points to entries in the BILL_DESC entity containing a description of the respective item in different languages.

column.name: FEATURE_DESC
column.comment: Flag that indicates whether a descriptive text of the invoice item is taken from the table BILL_DESCRIPTION.

column.name: REVENUE_CODE
column.comment: The revenue code of the feature category. · O - One Time Charges · R - Recurring Charges · U - Usage Charges

column.name: CSM_PARAM_REQ_IND
column.comment: This attribute is used by the CSM application to decide whether the parameters window should be popped up for the feature.

column.name: FEATURE_TYPE
column.comment: Type of feature for CSM purposes. FNF - Friends & Family 3 spaces or NULL - Regular GRP - Group-Type (only for usage features) AQC - Auto Quick Check. SMS - Short Message Service. VM - Voice Mail

column.name: SIM_REQ_IND
column.comment: The requirement of the feature for another SIM to be allocated.

column.name: CALL_DETAILS_CD
column.comment: This attributes is used  by Bill Formatter to display a short code of the feature on the bill.

column.name: AIR_TOLL_IND
column.comment: A - AIR T - TOLL

column.name: SPECIAL_PURPOSE_FTR
column.comment: The feature type is used to rate special SOC types. · FNF - Friends & Family · GRP - Group

column.name: BEST_RATE_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the feature participates in at least one best rate scheme.  This field is updated each time a best rate scheme is added/updated.

column.name: FEATURE_PRES_SET_CD
column.comment: N/A

column.name: SK_RELEVANT_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the OTC feature will be presented in the drop down list of OTCs that can be waived for a specific skeleton condition.

column.name: SWITCH_PARAM
column.comment: This attribute defines the Switch parameter for the Switch code.
